RmUtility::MappedSonarReading Struct Reference

Provides a means of representing a range reading in the context of a Cartesian coordinate system, where the robot, sonar, and range reading are all mapped to specific cooordinates. More...

#include <RmUtility.h>

 The position of the sensed object as identified in the reading.
SonarReading reading
 The sonar reading for which other data is calculated.
Pose sonarPose
 The position and heading of the sonar identified in the reading.

 Sends a text representation of the given object to the given stream.

Detailed Description

Provides a means of representing a range reading in the context of a Cartesian coordinate system, where the robot, sonar, and range reading are all mapped to specific cooordinates.
